Reason: The configuration option 'gi.igi.samples' in the 'sunflow' software project is performance-sensitive because changing its value significantly impacts the rendering performance of the application. Increasing the value of 'gi.igi.samples' can lead to higher memory consumption and longer rendering times, while decreasing it can result in faster rendering but lower quality output. Therefore, any change in this configuration option can have notable variations in execution time and memory consumption, making it performance-sensitive.
